verses.verse: Now it happened <S%H1961><s%> at the end <S%H7093><s%> of two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2492><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> he was standing <S%H5975><s%> by the Nile. <S%H2975><s%>

And lo, <S%H2009><s%> from the Nile <S%H2975><s%> there came <S%H5927><s%> up seven <S%H7651><s%> cows, <S%H6510><s%> sleek <S%H3303><s%> and fat; <S%H1277><s%> and they grazed <S%H7462><s%> in the marsh <S%H260><s%> grass. <S%H260><s%>

Then behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them from the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> ugly <S%H7451><s%> and gaunt, <S%H1851><s%> <S%H1320><s%> and they stood <S%H5975><s%> by the [other] cows <S%H6510><s%> on the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the Nile. <S%H2975><s%>

And the ugly <S%H7451><s%> and gaunt <S%H1851><s%> <S%H1320><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> up the seven <S%H7651><s%> sleek <S%H3303><s%> and fat <S%H1277><s%> cows. <S%H6510><s%> Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> awoke. <S%H3364><s%>

And he fell <S%H3462><s%> asleep <S%H3462><s%> and dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> time; <S%H8145><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> of grain <S%H7641><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up on a single <S%H259><s%> stalk, <S%H7070><s%> plump <S%H1277><s%> and good. <S%H2896><s%>

Then behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ears, <S%H7641><s%> thin <S%H1851><s%> and scorched <S%H7710><s%> by the east <S%H6921><s%> wind, <S%H6921><s%> sprouted <S%H6779><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them.

And the thin <S%H1851><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> up the seven <S%H7651><s%> plump <S%H1277><s%> and full <S%H4392><s%> ears. <S%H7641><s%> Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> awoke, <S%H3364><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [it was] a dream. <S%H2472><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the morning <S%H1242><s%> that his spirit <S%H7307><s%> was troubled, <S%H6470><s%> so he sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its wise <S%H2450><s%> men. <S%H2450><s%> And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> them his dreams, <S%H2472><s%> but there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who could interpret <S%H6622><s%> them to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

Then the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "I would make mention <S%H2142><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> of my [own] offenses. <S%H2399><s%>

"Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was furious <S%H7107><s%> with his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and he put <S%H5414><s%> me in confinement <S%H4929><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the bodyguard, <S%H2876><s%> [both] me and the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker. <S%H644><s%>

"And we had <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> on the same <S%H259><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> he and I; each <S%H376><s%> of us dreamed <S%H2492><s%> according to the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> of his [own] dream. <S%H2472><s%>

"Now a Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> youth <S%H5288><s%> [was] with us there, <S%H8033><s%> a servant <S%H5650><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the bodyguard, <S%H2876><s%> and we related <S%H5608><s%> [them] to him, and he interpreted <S%H6622><s%> our dreams <S%H2472><s%> for us. To each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> he interpreted <S%H6622><s%> according to his [own] dream. <S%H2472><s%>

"And it came <S%H1961><s%> about that just <S%H9201><s%> as he interpreted <S%H6622><s%> for us, so <S%H3651><s%> it happened; <S%H1961><s%> he restored <S%H7725><s%> me in my office, <S%H3653><s%> but he hanged <S%H8518><s%> him."

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and they hurriedly <S%H7323><s%> brought <S%H7323><s%> him out of the dungeon; <S%H953><s%> and when he had shaved <S%H1548><s%> himself and changed <S%H2498><s%> his clothes, <S%H8071><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "I have had <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2472><s%> but no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> can interpret <S%H6622><s%> it; and I have heard <S%H8085><s%> it said <S%H559><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> you, that when you hear <S%H8085><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> you can interpret <S%H6622><s%> it."

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> then answered <S%H6030><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "It is not in me; God <S%H430><s%> will give <S%H6030><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> a favorable <S%H7965><s%> answer. <S%H6030><s%>"

So Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "In my dream, <S%H2472><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I was standing <S%H5975><s%> on the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the Nile; <S%H2975><s%>

and behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> cows, <S%H6510><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> and sleek <S%H3303><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up out of the Nile; <S%H2975><s%> and they grazed <S%H7462><s%> in the marsh <S%H260><s%> grass. <S%H260><s%>

"And lo, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them, poor <S%H1800><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> ugly <S%H7451><s%> and gaunt, <S%H7534><s%> <S%H1320><s%> such <S%H2007><s%> as I had never <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> for ugliness <S%H7455><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>
and the lean <S%H7534><s%> and ugly <S%H7451><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> up the first <S%H7223><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> cows. <S%H6510><s%>

"Yet when they had devoured <S%H935><s%> <S%H7130><s%> them, it could not be detected <S%H3045><s%> that they had devoured <S%H935><s%> <S%H7130><s%> them; for they were just <S%H9201><s%> as ugly <S%H7451><s%> as before. <S%H8462><s%> Then I awoke. <S%H3364><s%>

"I saw <S%H7200><s%> also in my dream, <S%H2472><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ears, <S%H7641><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> and good, <S%H2896><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up on a single <S%H259><s%> stalk; <S%H7070><s%>

and lo, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ears, <S%H7641><s%> withered, <S%H6798><s%> thin, <S%H1851><s%> [and] scorched <S%H7710><s%> by the east <S%H6921><s%> wind, <S%H6921><s%> sprouted <S%H6779><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them;

and the thin <S%H1851><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> ears. <S%H7641><s%> Then I told <S%H559><s%> it to the magicians, <S%H2748><s%> but there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who could explain <S%H5046><s%> it to me. "

Now Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s dreams <S%H2472><s%> are one <S%H259><s%> [and the same;] God <S%H430><s%> has told <S%H5046><s%> to Pharaoh what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> He is about to do. <S%H6213><s%>

"The seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> and the seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> the dreams <S%H2472><s%> are one <S%H259><s%> [and the same.]

"And the seven <S%H7651><s%> lean <S%H7534><s%> and ugly <S%H7451><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> that came <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them are seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and the seven <S%H7651><s%> thin <S%H7534><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> scorched <S%H7710><s%> by the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H6921><s%> shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine. <S%H7458><s%>
"It is as I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has shown <S%H7200><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> what <S%H834><s%> He is about to do. <S%H6213><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of great <S%H1419><s%> abundance <S%H7647><s%> are coming <S%H935><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

and after <S%H310><s%> them seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> will come, <S%H6965><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the abundance <S%H7647><s%> will be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> will ravage <S%H3615><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

"So the abundance <S%H7647><s%> will be unknown <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of that subsequent <S%H310><s%> famine; <S%H7458><s%> for it [will be] very <S%H3966><s%> severe. <S%H3515><s%>

"Now as for the repeating <S%H8138><s%> of the dream <S%H2472><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> twice, <S%H6471><s%> [it means] that the matter <S%H1697><s%> is determined <S%H3559><s%> by God, <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> will quickly <S%H4116><s%> bring <S%H6213><s%> it about. <S%H6213><s%>

"And now <S%H6258><s%> let Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> look <S%H7200><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%> discerning <S%H995><s%> and wise, <S%H2450><s%> and set <S%H7896><s%> him over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"Let Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> take <S%H6213><s%> action <S%H6213><s%> to appoint <S%H6485><s%> overseers <S%H6496><s%> in charge <S%H5921><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and let him exact <S%H2567><s%> a fifth <S%H2567><s%> [of the produce] of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of abundance. <S%H7647><s%>

"Then let them gather <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the food <S%H3978><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> that are coming, <S%H935><s%> and store <S%H6651><s%> up the grain <S%H1250><s%> for food <S%H400><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> Pharaoh's authority, <S%H3027><s%> and let them guard <S%H8104><s%> [it.]

"And let the food <S%H400><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> as a reserve <S%H6487><s%> for the land <S%H776><s%> for the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> which <S%H834><s%> will occur <S%H1961><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> may not perish <S%H3772><s%> during the famine. <S%H7458><s%>"
Now the proposal <S%H1697><s%> seemed <S%H3190><s%> good <S%H3190><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servants, <S%H5650><s%> "Can we find <S%H4672><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> like this, <S%H2088><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> is a divine <S%H430><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%>?"

So Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Since <S%H310><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has informed <S%H3045><s%> you of all <S%H3605><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> so discerning <S%H995><s%> and wise <S%H2450><s%> as you are.

"You shall be over <S%H5921><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> and according <S%H5921><s%> to your command <S%H6310><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> shall do <S%H5401><s%> homage; <S%H5401><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> in the throne <S%H3678><s%> I will be greater <S%H1431><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> you."

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "See <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> you over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> took <S%H5493><s%> off <S%H5493><s%> his signet <S%H2885><s%> ring <S%H2885><s%> from his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on Joseph's hand, <S%H3027><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him in garments <S%H899><s%> of fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> necklace <S%H7242><s%> around <S%H5921><s%> his neck. <S%H6677><s%>

And he had him ride <S%H7392><s%> in his second <S%H4932><s%> chariot; <S%H4818><s%> and they proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, "Bow <S%H86><s%> the knee! <S%H86><s%>" And he set <S%H5414><s%> him over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Moreover, Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "[Though] I am Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> yet without <S%H1107><s%> your permission no <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H376><s%> shall raise <S%H7311><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> or foot <S%H7272><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> Zaphenath-paneah; and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him Asenath, <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Potiphera <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On, <S%H204><s%> as his wife. <S%H802><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Now Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
And during the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of plenty <S%H7647><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> brought <S%H6213><s%> forth <S%H6213><s%> abundantly. <S%H7062><s%>

So he gathered <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the food <S%H400><s%> of [these] seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> occurred <S%H1961><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and placed <S%H5414><s%> the food <S%H400><s%> in the cities; <S%H5892><s%> he placed <S%H5414><s%> in every city <S%H5892><s%> the food <S%H400><s%> from its own surrounding <S%H5439><s%> fields. <S%H7704><s%>

Thus Joseph <S%H3130><s%> stored <S%H6651><s%> up grain <S%H1250><s%> in great <S%H3966><s%> abundance <S%H3966><s%> like the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3588><s%> he stopped <S%H2308><s%> measuring <S%H5608><s%> [it,] for it was beyond <S%H369><s%> measure. <S%H4557><s%>

Now before <S%H2962><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Asenath, <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Potiphera <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On, <S%H204><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> the first-born Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> "For," [he said,] "God <S%H430><s%> has made me forget <S%H5382><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my trouble <S%H5999><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> my father's household. <S%H1004><s%>"

And he named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> "For," [he said,] "God <S%H430><s%> has made <S%H6509><s%> me fruitful <S%H6509><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of my affliction. <S%H6040><s%>"

When the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of plenty <S%H7647><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> came <S%H3615><s%> to an end, <S%H3615><s%>

and the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to come, <S%H935><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had said, <S%H559><s%> then there was famine <S%H7458><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the lands; <S%H776><s%> but in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> there was bread. <S%H3899><s%>
